subsection_content: Obesity is a condition in which the body accumulates too many calories, higher than its needs. Excess calories are then stored as fat or adipose tissue. However, being overweight does not mean obesity, especially in people with a lot of muscle or large bones. (2)
subsection_data:
beo phi.json. What is obesity?
Obesity is a condition in which the body accumulates too many calories, higher than its needs. Excess calories are then stored as fat or adipose tissue. However, being overweight does not mean obesity, especially in people with a lot of muscle or large bones. (2)
